## Enrollment by site

```{r enrollment-by-site}
play_w_sites <- readr::read_csv(file.path(params$project_root_dir, "data/csv/release_1.0/aggregate/PLAY_non_mbcdi_all_databrary.csv"), show_col_types = FALSE)

play_w_sites <- play_w_sites %>%
  dplyr::rename(., qa_group = group_name)
  
xtabs(formula = ~ site_id + qa_group, data = play_w_sites) %>%
  knitr::kable(., format = 'html') %>%
  kableExtra::kable_material(.)
```
